content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation, electrical_id 30316.
- ElectricityGroup (id 30316) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warnings: "out of fuel"; contains water (≈190.31 at temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); linked to fluid_system 164219.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; linked to fluid_system 164219.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroups:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 164219; status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 164218; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 164231; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 164230; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 164226; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 164235; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 164234; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 164237; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 164238; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 164239; status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid_System Identifier Mismatch:
   - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers (163555, 163639, 163721, 163805, 163887, 163971, 164053, 164137) failed to locate any candidate within the designated search radius.
   - Tip: Verify and use the current active fluid_system identifier (now 164219 for the working pipe group) when issuing connection commands.

• Inadequate Search Radius Configuration:
   - The consistent absence of candidate pipe groups indicates that the search parameters—such as radius and positional inputs—are not aligned with the actual pipeline network configuration.
   - Tip: Adjust the search radius and update input parameters to accurately reflect the positions and fluid_system identifiers of the available pipe groups.
